short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily track the price history of items on your favorite websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Trackr is a Chrome extension that shows the price history of listings, helping you track how property prices change over time. Whether you're searching for your next home or evaluating investment opportunities, Trackr provides the insights you need to make informed decisions.

How it Works:
Once installed, Trackr adds a small arrow under each post to display the price trend:

Green arrow: The price has decreased since the last update.
Red arrow: The price has increased since the last update.
Grey arrow: No changes in the price.

Take control of your real estate journey with Trackr. Install it now and start spotting the best deals effortlessly!

At the moment, we support only zillow.com - more sites will be added !
